description: Smallest prime p dividing n#-1, n#, or n#+1, n squarefree.
references: Ashbacher, C. ``A Note on the Smarandache Near-To-Primorial Function.'' {\it Smarandache Notions J.} {\bf 7}, 46-49, 1996.
Mudge, M. R. ``The Smarandache Near-To-Primorial Function.'' {\it Abstracts of Papers Presented to the Amer. Math. Soc.} {\bf 17}, 585, 1996.
links: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Smarandache Near-to-Primorial Function
formula: Smallest prime p such that n divides one of p#-1, p#, p#+1
author: _Eric W. Weisstein_
